review: Lag and Delay... These words precisely describe the product's operation. For me, it feels like the Chromecast was made for the sole purpose of watching short movies or casual stuff in low resolution - typically YouTube or FaceBook stuff. It is really impossible to watch an entire movie, of 1 hour duration or more, without getting major frame skips, lost of audio sync and/or lost of subtitles sync. Plus, the feature of 'casting over Google Chrome browser' - that should get rid of the product's already limited compatibility with other low-end video streaming sites - doesn't work well enough, only adding the complains I have stated before. Bottom line: Not worth buying it.
